label: 格
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: supplementary legislation issued after the promulgation of the ritsuryô codes, from the early eighth century onward. They were periodically compiled in compendia such as those of the Kônin- and Jôgan eras in the ninth century, and in the encyclopaedic Supplementary Legislation of Three Eras Categorized (Ruijû sandai kyaku 類聚三代格) of the early tenth century.　[律令]
